articles.description: Bale is a free agent following the end of his nine-year stay at Real Madrid, and has said that he will resolve his future following his summer break.
articles.content:
Gareth Bale has boosted Cardiff's hopes of signing him by suggesting the standard of football he plays before the World Cup does not make 'too much of a difference'.
